content.question: Which of the following best describes Deism?

choices.label: A belief that the course of each individualâ€™s life is predestined by God
A concept of toleration advanced by Quaker preachers
The belief that God had created the world but allowed it to operate through the laws of nature
A principle taught in colonial New England colleges
A radical theory encouraging free love and communal living

content.answer: The belief that God had created the world but allowed it to operate through the laws of nature

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
